name: Punchy's Puzzle
description:
This game was built for the Curdle Game Jam #30 by DevCam.

All assets you see I created/coded.

The music I used was royalty free from fesliyanstudios.com

CONTROLS:

Press "Left Mouse Button" to punch

Move mouse left and right to adjust punch angle

Press "Esc" to open menu

Press "Esc" then "R" to quick restart
